title: Boardwalk Kings
description: I’m indebted to the Boardwalk Kings...Dante, Nico, Angelo, and Stefan.Four ruthless Made men who own Atlantic City and everyone in it—including me.My father launders money for the Mafia and made the mistake of stealing from them.Now, they own me in every way, taking what they want, branding me with their blood-stained hands.They call me a good girl.The perfect captive.That’s what I want them to believe.Because this good girl is really a bad girl in disguise.Boardwalk Kings is an enemies-to-lovers Mafia romance with DARK themes. The heroine will have a HEA with all four love interests by the end of the series.
author: Jillian Frost
